%%========================
%% Core game coordination
%%========================
class Game {
  +GameState state
  +start()
  +pause()
  +resume()
  +gameOver()
  +updateTick()
  +advanceLevel()
}

class GameLoop {
  +tickRate
  +start()
  +stop()
  +tick()
}

class Level {
  +levelNumber
  +init()
  +isComplete() bool
  +increaseDifficulty()
}

class LifeManager {
  +livesRemaining
  +loseLife()
  +resetPositions()
  +isGameOver() bool
}

class Score {
  +currentScore
  +addPoints(points)
  +reset()
}

class CollisionDetector {
  +checkCollisions()
  +resolvePacmanGhost(p: PacMan, g: Ghost)
}

Game --> GameLoop : controls
Game --> Level : manages
Game --> LifeManager : uses
Game --> Score : owns
Game --> CollisionDetector : uses

%%========================
%% Maze and tiles
%%========================
class Maze {
  +width
  +height
  +isWall(pos) bool
  +canMove(from,to) bool
  +getTile(pos) Tile
}

class Tile {
  +position
  +passable : bool
  +hasItem() bool
  +removeItem()
}

Maze "1" o-- "*" Tile : contains
Level --> Maze : loads

%%========================
%% Entities
%%========================
class Entity {
  <<abstract>>
  +position
  +direction
  +move()
}

class PacMan {
  +lives
  +changeDirection(dir)
  +consume(item: Item)
}

class Ghost {
  <<abstract>>
  +speed
  +state : GhostState
  +setState(s: GhostState)
  +updateAI()
}

Entity <|-- PacMan
Entity <|-- Ghost

Ghost --> Maze : navigates

CollisionDetector --> Ghost : checks

class GhostState {

}
